definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
young lady of the house/wife of the young master
lit. to beg grandpa and call on grandma (idiom)/fig. to go about begging for help
pinyin: qiu2 ye2 ye5 gao4 nai3 nai5

sentences.english: Look at my feet, grandma frozen stiff decided to make a pair of cloth padded boots.
sentences.chinese: 看着我凍僵的小腳，奶奶決定給我做一雙布棉鞋。

sentences.english: Then he rushed into Mr Sun's kitchen to save her.
sentences.chinese: 然後他衝進孫奶奶家的廚房去救她。

sentences.english: Returns the home to be told grandma, grandma said to buy new?
sentences.chinese: 回到家就告訴奶奶，奶奶說要買新的嗎？

sentences.english: Returns the home to be told grandma, grandma said to buy new?
sentences.chinese: 回到家就告訴奶奶，奶奶說要買新的嗎？

sentences.english: My English grandma saw my mum plant so many courgette and thought it was a bit strange.
sentences.chinese: 我奶奶見我媽種那麼多西葫蘆，覺得奇怪。

sentences.english: Zhang Fang and Grandma are doing some shopping in thenearby supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 張芳和奶奶正在附近超市裏購物呢。

sentences.english: My gramma, she owns the Pink Palace.
sentences.chinese: 我的奶奶，她擁有這個粉色宮殿。

sentences.english: Tops nanna getting her grand-kiddy a soy milk treat.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶給她的孫女買一個豆奶點心。

sentences.english: As long as grandpa's grandmother be on the hoof, they would assurance father be also deathless .
sentences.chinese: 只要爺爺奶奶活着，他們會保證爸爸也不死。

sentences.english: Not only the children but also their grandma wants to read the picture book.
sentences.chinese: 不僅孩子們想看小人書，他們的奶奶也想看。

sentences.english: Grandma cooked rice-soup and the family hope you grow up fast.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶米飯，湯和家庭的希望你長大了快。

sentences.english: This is an age-old approach, recommended by many country grandmothers.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種古老的方法，由許多鄉村老奶奶推薦。

sentences.english: Zhao Junxin learned the craft of embroidering from his grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 趙俊信從奶奶那裏學到了刺繡的手藝。

sentences.english: Abuelita, do you think Mommy and Daddy will ever get back together again?
sentences.chinese: 奶奶，你認爲媽媽和爸爸會再次在一起嗎？

sentences.english: Our granddaddies swung on them nooses . Our grandmamas swung on them nooses .
sentences.chinese: 我們的爺爺奶奶們懸掛在繩套上。

sentences.english: My grandmamma told me when she was born she was a Christian.
sentences.chinese: 我的奶奶告訴我，她從小就是基督徒。

definition: (coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
maternal aunt/step-mother/childcare worker/nursemaid/woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child)/CL:個|个[ge4]
